objects.__Episode__synopsis: Robb descobre que Catelyn libertou secretamente Jaime Lannister, que Brienne está escoltando para resgatá-lo em troca de Sansa e Arya; Robb coloca sua mãe em prisão domiciliar e envia homens para capturar Jaime. Robb é atraído por uma médica espirituosa, Talisa Maegyr, uma mulher de Volantis. Yara chega a Winterfell e critica a tomada de Theon por Theon, dizendo que não tem valor estratégico para os Ironborn. Ele se recusa a voltar para Pyke com ela. Quando Tywin deixa Harrenhal para atacar Robb, Arya coage H'ghar a ajudá-la, Gendry e seu amigo Torta Quente a escapar. Em Porto Real, Cersei tenta chantagear Tyrion sequestrando Ros, que a primeira acredita ser sua amante secreta. Joffrey castiga Varys por não ter mais conhecimento das posições dos Stark e se prepara para liderar o ataque contra o próprio Stannis. A caminho de Porto Real, Stannis promete fazer de Davos sua Mão do Rei. Além da Muralha, o líder selvagem, "Rattleshirt", leva os capturados Jon e Halfhand ao seu rei, Mance Rayder. No Punho dos Primeiros Homens, os irmãos da Patrulha da Noite encontram um esconderijo de armas de vidro de dragão, deixados lá por um irmão anterior da Patrulha da Noite. Em Qarth, Jorah concorda em acompanhar Daenerys à Casa dos Imortais para recuperar seus dragões. Brandon e Rickon são revelados vivos e escondidos em Winterfell.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Stannis está a poucos dias de Porto Real. Tyrion se prepara para sua chegada. Jon e Qhorin são feitos prisioneiros pelos selvagens. Catelyn é presa por libertar Jaime. Arya, Gendry e Torta Quente planejam escapar de Harrenhal.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E8 - The Prince of Winterfell

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Robb learns that Catelyn secretly freed Jaime Lannister, who Brienne is escorting to ransom him in exchange for Sansa and Arya; Robb places his mother under house arrest and sends men to capture Jaime. Robb is attracted to a spirited medic, Talisa Maegyr, a woman from Volantis. Yara arrives at Winterfell and criticizes Theon's seizing it, saying it has no strategic value to the Ironborn. He refuses to return to Pyke with her. When Tywin leaves Harrenhal to attack Robb, Arya coerces H'ghar into helping her, Gendry, and their friend, Hot Pie to escape. In King's Landing, Cersei attempts to blackmail Tyrion by abducting Ros, whom the former believes is his secret lover. Joffrey chastises Varys for not having more knowledge of Stark positions, and prepares to lead the attack against Stannis himself. En route to King's Landing, Stannis promises to make Davos his Hand of the King. Beyond the Wall, the Wildling leader, "Rattleshirt", leads the captured Jon and Halfhand to his king, Mance Rayder. At the Fist of the First Men, the brothers of the Night's Watch find a hidden cache of dragonglass weapons, left there by a previous Night's Watch brother. In Qarth, Jorah agrees to accompany Daenerys to the House of the Undying to retrieve her dragons. Brandon and Rickon are revealed to be alive and hiding in Winterfell.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Stannis is just days from King's Landing. Tyrion prepares for his arrival. Jon and Qhorin are taken prisoner by the wildlings. Catelyn is arrested for releasing Jaime. Arya, Gendry, and Hot Pie plan to escape from Harrenhal.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E8 - The Prince of Winterfell

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Retornando à Ilha Pyke depois de nove anos como pupilo dos Stark, Theon se reencontra com sua irmã, Yara, e seu pai, Balon, que despreza os modos nortenhos adquiridos por Theon. Balon planeja reconquistar sua coroa pela força. Cersei rejeita os termos de Robb, e Tyrion exila Slynt, chefe dos Mantos Dourados, para a Patrulha do Cavaleiro, e promove Bronn a Comandante da Patrulha. A caminho de Castelo Negro, Arya, se passando por um menino, admite sua verdadeira identidade para Gendry. Em Craster's Keep, ao norte da Muralha, Samwell Tarly é abordado por Gilly, uma das filhas de Craster. Gilly teme por seu filho ainda não nascido se for um menino; Jon Snow resiste a ajudar, apesar dos apelos de Sam. No Deserto Vermelho, um cavalo retorna ao acampamento de Daenerys com a cabeça decepada de seu cavaleiro em uma bolsa, uma mensagem de seus inimigos. Em Pedra do Dragão, o ex-contrabandista Sor Davos Seaworth, que agora serve Stannis, recruta o pirata Salladhor Saan e sua frota para o lado de Stannis. Stannis tenta gerar um herdeiro masculino com Melisandre, pois sua esposa, Selyse, não conseguiu produzir um filho. Jon descobre que Craster sacrifica seus filhos aos Caminhantes Brancos; Craster o pega espionando e deixa Jon inconsciente.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Arya faz amizade com Gendry. Tyrion tenta assumir o controle do Pequeno Conselho. Theon chega em sua casa, Pyke, para persuadir seu pai a ajudar Robb na guerra. Jon tenta investigar o segredo de Craster.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Returning to Pyke Island after nine years as the Starks' ward, Theon is reunited with his sister, Yara, and his father, Balon, who despises Theon's acquired Northern ways. Balon plots to win back his crown by force. Cersei rejects Robb's terms, and Tyrion exiles Slynt, head of the Gold Cloaks, to the Knight's Watch, and promotes Bronn to Commander of the Watch. En route to Castle Black, Arya, impersonating a boy, admits her true identity to Gendry. At Craster's Keep, north of the Wall, Samwell Tarly is approached by Gilly, one of Craster's daughters. Gilly fears for her unborn child if it is a boy; Jon Snow resists helping, despite Sam's pleas. In the Red Waste, a horse returns to Daenerys' camp with its rider's severed head in a pouch, a message from her enemies. In Dragonstone, former smuggler Ser Davos Seaworth, who now serves Stannis, recruits the pirate Salladhor Saan and his fleet to Stannis' side. Stannis attempts to sire a male heir with Melisandre, as his wife, Selyse has failed to produce a son. Jon discovers that Craster sacrifices his sons to the White Walkers; Craster catches him spying and knocks Jon unconscious.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Arya makes friends with Gendry. Tyrion tries to take control of the Small Council. Theon arrives at his home, Pyke, in order to persuade his father into helping Robb with the war. Jon tries to investigate Craster's secret.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types
Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Jon leaves for Hardhome with Tormund and some rangers. Maester Aemon dies shortly after. Gilly is attacked by two Watchmen. Samwell intervenes and is overpowered until Ghost threatens them. Samwell and Gilly consummate their relationship. Sansa begs Theon to help her escape Winterfell, but instead he informs Ramsay, who then flays Brienne's informant inside Winterfell. At his army camp, Stannis refuses Melisandre request to sacrifice Shireen to gain the God of Lights favor. Jorah and Tyrion are sold to slaver, Qaggaz, and are taken to Daznak's fighting pit. Daenerys and her consort, Loraq, inspect the pit in preparation for the upcoming games. Jorah defeats the other fighters, reveals his identity and Tyrion appears as his "gift" to her. In Dorne, while in the dungeon, Tyene Sand gives Bronn the antidote to a poison called "The Long Farewell" that she has infected him with. Prince Doran allows Jaime take Myrcella and her fiance, Prince Trystane, to King's Landing. The High Sparrow denies Olenna's demand that Loras and Margaery be released. The High Sparrow then arrests Cersei for her previous affair with her cousin Lancel.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon heads east as trouble begins to stir for Sam and Gilly at Castle Black. Sansa asks Theon for help. Tyrion and Jorah are sold as slaves. Cersei savors her triumph over the Tyrells as new plots are developed in the shadows.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E2 - The House of Black and White
objects.__Episode__title_short: A Casa do Preto e Branco

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Arya arrives in Braavos and is accepted into the "House of Black and White" by Jaqen H'ghar, who calls himself and his colleagues, "no one". Jaime recruits Bronn to travel to Dorne with him to retrieve Jaime's niece/daughter Myrcella, who is now betrothed to Trystane Martell, Prince Doran's son. Podrick recognises Littlefinger and Sansa in a tavern; Brienne offers Sansa her protection but is rebuffed. Littlefinger insists Brienne come with them, but she refuses and escapes with Podrick, then secretly follows Sansa. Stannis offers Jon legitimacy and lordship of Winterfell if he leaves the Night's Watch and supports him, but Jon keeps his vow to the Night's Watch; Samwell nominates Jon as Lord Commander against Alliser Thorne; Maester Aemon casts his ballot for Jon, breaking a tie vote. Daenerys incites a riot by executing a former slave who murdered a Sons of the Harpy prisoner prior to his trial. Drogon reappears, but soon leaves.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Arya arrives in Braavos. Jaime takes on a secret mission. Ellaria Sand seeks revenge for Oberyn's death. Stannis makes Jon a generous offer as the Night's Watch elects a new Lord Commander. Daenerys is faced with a difficult decision.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E2 - The House of Black and White
objects.__Episode__title_short: The House of Black and White

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E9 - The Dance of Dragons

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Ramsay leads a covert attack on Stannis' camp, destroying siege equipment, food stores, and killing many horses. After dispatching Davos to Castle Black to request more supplies, Stannis, with Selyse's approval, allows Melisandre to sacrifice Shireen, burning her alive at the stake, believing it will help win the war. Jon and the other survivors return to the Wall, allowing the Wildlings to pass South. In Dorne, Prince Doran has permitted Jaime and Bronn to return to King's Landing with Myrcella, provided Trystane accompanies them and serves on the small council in Oberyn's stead. Doran also pardons Ellaria and her daughters. Arya aborts her first assassination assignment after spotting Trant accompanying Mace Tyrell, the Master of Coin, who has arrived in Braavos to negotiate with the Iron Bank. In Meereen, combat at Daznak's fighting pit resume. Daenerys is stunned that Jorah is among the fighters. His victory is interrupted when the Sons of the Harpy launch a surprise attack. Loraq is killed while Jorah saves Daenerys. The Harpies quickly swarm Daenerys and her supporters, forcing them and Jorah to retreat into the pit. Drogon suddenly arrives, burning many Sons of the Harpy; Daenerys mounts Drogon and commands him to fly away.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon and the wildlings return to Castle Black. Jaime meets with Doran Martell. Stannis makes a hard choice. Arya runs into Meryn Trant. Daenerys attends the grand reopening of the fighting pits.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S05E9 - The Dance of Dragons

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Tyrion, sabendo que a Coroa está profundamente endividada com o Banco de Ferro, convence Olenna a pagar metade do casamento real. Sansa diz a Mindinho que quer ficar em Porto Real. Tywin descobre a intenção dos Tyrell de casar Sansa com Loras. Para contornar isso, ele planeja casar Sansa com Tyrion, e Cersei com Loras sobre as objeções de ambos os Lannister. Stannis confessa sua infidelidade a sua esposa, Selyse, que diz que conhece e aprova. A filha deles, a princesa Shireen, entra no calabouço para visitar Davos e o ensina a ler. Sandor é libertado depois de matar Dondarrion no julgamento por combate. Thoros ressuscita Dondarrion, usando o poder do Senhor da Luz. Gendry permanece com a Irmandade, que pretende resgatar Arya para Robb. Depois de ser entregue a Roose Bolton, Jaime diz a Brienne que ele matou o rei "louco" Aerys Targaryen para evitar que ele destruísse Porto Real com um incêndio. Robb executa Lord Karstark depois que este mata dois garotos Lannister em cativeiro. Com os Karstark o abandonando, Robb espera fazer uma nova aliança com Walder Frey. Ygritte seduz Jon, que quebra seus votos da Patrulha da Noite. Daenerys encoraja os Imaculados a escolher um líder entre eles; eles escolhem o Verme Cinzento.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: O exército de Robb está desmoronando. Jaime revela uma história, a Brienne, que nunca contou a ninguém. Jon quebra seus votos. O Cão recebe sua liberdade. Os Lannisters traçam um novo plano.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Tyrion, knowing the Crown is deeply in debt to the Iron Bank, persuades Olenna to pay for half of the royal wedding. Sansa tells Littlefinger she wants to remain in King's Landing. Tywin discovers the Tyrells' intend to marry Sansa to Loras. To circumvent this, he plots to marry Sansa to Tyrion, and Cersei to Loras over both Lannister's objections. Stannis confesses his infidelity to his wife, Selyse, who says she knows and approves. Their daughter, Princess Shireen, sneaks into the dungeon to visit Davos and teaches him to read. Sandor is released after killing Dondarrion in the trial by combat. Thoros resurrects Dondarrion, using the Lord of Light's power. Gendry remains with the Brotherhood, who intend to ransom Arya to Robb. After being delivered to Roose Bolton, Jaime tells Brienne he killed "Mad" King Aerys Targaryen to prevent his destroying King's Landing with wildfire. Robb executes Lord Karstark after the latter murders two captive Lannister boys. With the Karstarks abandoning him, Robb hopes to make a new alliance with Walder Frey. Ygritte seduces Jon, who breaks his Night's Watch vows. Daenerys encourages the Unsullied to choose a leader among them; they choose Grey Worm.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Robb's army is falling apart. Jaime reveals a story, to Brienne, that he has never told anyone. Jon breaks his vows. The Hound is granted his freedom. The Lannisters hatch a new plan.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Tommen é coroado rei; Cersei surpreende Margaery encorajando-a a se casar com Tommen. Tywin pede a Oberyn que seja juiz no julgamento de Tyrion e jura sua inocência no estupro e assassinato de Elia. No Vale, Mindinho leva Sansa para o Ninho da Águia, onde ela se reencontra com sua tia, Lysa Arryn, que pressiona Mindinho a se casar com ela imediatamente. É revelado que Lysa e Mindinho mataram Jon Arryn e incriminaram os Lannisters. Lysa planeja que Sansa se case com seu filho, Robin, um menino pré-adolescente emocionalmente imaturo. The Hound zomba de Arya praticando sua dança na água e menospreza o estilo de luta de Syrios Forell. Brienne descobre que Podrick não possui habilidades práticas de escudeiro, mas fica impressionada por ele ter matado uma Guarda Real para proteger Tyrion. Além da Muralha, o grupo de Jon encontra e derrota os amotinados. Sem que Jon saiba, Bran e seus companheiros estão presos lá. Locke tenta sequestrar Bran na confusão, mas Hodor, pressionado por Bran, o mata e liberta os outros. Jojen convence Bran de que eles devem continuar para o norte, enquanto os homens de Jon estão queimando a Fortaleza de Craster e libertando sua filha/esposas. Em Meereen, depois que Jorah informa a Daenerys que Astapor e Yunkai voltaram à escravidão, ela adia a invasão de Westeros para governar como rainha até que a Baía dos Escravos seja verdadeiramente livre.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tommen é coroado Rei dos Sete Reinos. Cersei constrói seu caso contra Tyrion. Sansa e Lord Baelish chegam ao Ninho da Águia. A Patrulha da Noite ataca a Fortaleza de Craster.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E5 - First of His Name

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Tommen is crowned king; Cersei surprises Margaery by encouraging her to marry Tommen. Tywin asks Oberyn to be a judge at Tyrion's trial and swears his innocence in Elia's rape and murder. In the Vale, Littlefinger takes Sansa to the Eyrie where she is reunited with her aunt, Lysa Arryn, who pressures Littlefinger to marry her immediately. It is revealed that Lysa and Littlefinger killed Jon Arryn and framed the Lannisters. Lysa plans for Sansa to marry her son, Robin, an emotionally immature prepubescent boy. The Hound mocks Arya practicing her water dancing and disparages Syrios Forell's fighting style. Brienne learns that Podrick lacks practical squiring skills but is impressed he killed a Kingsguard to protect Tyrion. Beyond the Wall, Jon's group find and defeat the mutineers. Unknown to Jon, Bran and his companions are captives there. Locke attempts to kidnap Bran in the confusion, but Hodor, warged into by Bran, kills him and frees the others. Jojen convinces Bran that they must continue north, while Jon's men are burning Craster's Keep and free his daughter/wives. In Meereen, after Jorah informs Daenerys that Astapor and Yunkai have reverted to slavery, she postpones invading Westeros to instead rule as queen until Slaver's Bay is truly free.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tommen is crowned King of the Seven Kingdoms. Cersei builds her case against Tyrion. Sansa and Lord Baelish arrive at the Eyrie. The Night's Watch attacks Craster's Keep.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S04E5 - First of His Name

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Contra a vontade de Cersei, Tyrion envia ela e a filha de Jaime, Myrcella, para Dorne para proteção. Theon captura Winterfell e executa Sor Rodrik Cassel. Osha, o Wildling cativo, junto com Hodor, ajuda Bran e Rickon a escapar. Robb se reúne com a curandeira, Talisa Maegyr. No Punho dos Primeiros Homens, Jon captura uma selvagem chamada Ygritte, mas é separado de sua patrulha enquanto a persegue depois que ela escapa. Joffrey incita um motim em Porto Real, no qual ele quase é morto e Sansa quase estuprada. Tywin permite que Mindinho busque a fidelidade dos Tyrell. Em Harrenhal, Arya manda H'ghar matar um oficial que suspeita dela. Robb recebe notícias sobre a traição de Theon e envia homens para retomar Winterfell. Em Qarth, Daenerys trabalha para conseguir um navio para transportar um exército para Westeros enquanto mantém Daxos à distância. Uma das empregadas de Daenerys é morta e seus dragões roubados.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Theon assume o controle de Winterfell. Jon captura uma selvagem, chamada Ygritte. O povo de Porto Real começa a se voltar contra o Rei Joffrey. Daenerys procura comprar navios para navegar pelos Sete Reinos.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E6 - The Old Gods and the New
objects.__Episode__title_short: Os Deuses Antigos e os Novos

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Against Cersei's wishes, Tyrion sends her and Jaime's daughter, Myrcella, to Dorne for protection. Theon captures Winterfell and executes Ser Rodrik Cassel. Osha, the captive Wildling, along with Hodor, helps Bran and Rickon escape. Robb reunites with the healer, Talisa Maegyr. At the Fist of the First Men, Jon captures a Wildling named Ygritte, but is separated from his patrol while pursuing her after she escapes. Joffrey incites a riot at King's Landing, in which he is nearly killed and Sansa almost raped. Tywin allows Littlefinger to seek the Tyrells' allegiance. At Harrenhal, Arya has H'ghar kill an officer who is suspicious of her. Robb receives news about Theon's treachery and sends men to retake Winterfell. At Qarth, Daenerys works to procure a ship to transport an army to Westeros while keeping Daxos at bay. One of Daenerys' maids is killed and her dragons stolen.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Theon seizes control of Winterfell. Jon captures a wildling, named Ygritte. The people of King's Landing begin to turn against King Joffrey. Daenerys looks to buy ships to sail for the Seven Kingdoms.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E6 - The Old Gods and the New
objects.__Episode__title_short: The Old Gods and the New

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Porto Real hospeda o casamento de Tyrion e Sansa. Cersei mostra seu descontentamento com Margaery e Loras. Na festa de casamento, Tyrion causa uma cena de embriaguez. Tywin exige que Tyrion produza rapidamente um herdeiro Lannister, mas Tyrion mais tarde garante a Sansa que seu casamento nunca será consumado sem o consentimento dela. Sandor diz a Arya que eles estão indo para as Gêmeas para resgatá-la para Robb. Stannis libera Davos, exigindo que ele respeite Melisandre. Ela chega em Pedra do Dragão com Gendry, a quem ela seduz para extrair seu sangue usando sanguessugas. Em um ritual mágico, Stannis lança as sanguessugas cheias de sangue no fogo enquanto nomeia três usurpadores: Robb Stark, Balon Greyjoy e Rei Joffrey. Daenerys descobre que Yunkai empregou mercenários chamados de "Segundos Filhos". Um de seus belos tenentes, Daario Naharis, mata os outros líderes e promete a lealdade da empresa a Daenerys. Sam e Gilly são atacados por um White Walker, que Sam destrói com uma adaga de vidro de dragão.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Daenerys tenta persuadir os Segundos Filhos a se juntarem a ela contra Yunkai. Stannis libera Davos das masmorras. Sam e Gilly são atacados por um White Walker. Sansa e Tyrion se casam.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: King's Landing hosts Tyrion and Sansa's wedding. Cersei shows her displeasure toward Margaery and Loras. At the wedding feast, Tyrion cause a drunken scene. Tywin demands that Tyrion quickly produce a Lannister heir, but Tyrion later assures Sansa their marriage will never be consummated without her consent. Sandor tells Arya they are heading for the Twins to ransom her to Robb. Stannis releases Davos, demanding he respect Melisandre. She arrives in Dragonstone with Gendry, whom she seduces to extract his blood using leeches. In a magical ritual, Stannis casts the blood-filled leeches into a fire while naming three usurpers: Robb Stark, Balon Greyjoy, and King Joffrey. Daenerys learns that Yunkai has employed mercenaries called the "Second Sons". One of their handsome lieutenants, Daario Naharis, kills the other leaders and pledges the company's loyalty to Daenerys. Sam and Gilly are attacked by a White Walker, which Sam destroys with a dragonglass dagger.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Daenerys tries to persuade the Second Sons to join her against Yunkai. Stannis releases Davos from the dungeons. Sam and Gilly are attacked by a White Walker. Sansa and Tyrion wed.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Ao retornar a Porto Real, Tyrion para em Winterfell, onde apresenta aos Stark um design de sela que permitirá ao paraplégico Bran andar a cavalo. Ned investiga secretamente a morte de Jon Arryn. No processo, ele descobre um dos filhos ilegítimos do rei Robert, Gendry, um armeiro. Robert e seus convidados participam de um torneio em homenagem a Ned, que Ned considera uma extravagância. Jon toma medidas para proteger Samwell Tarly, um recruta da Patrulha da Noite desajeitado e sem amigos, do abuso dos outros Watchmen. Um Viserys frustrado entra em conflito com sua irmã recém-empoderada. Sansa sonha em um dia se tornar rainha, enquanto Arya imagina um futuro muito diferente. Em uma taverna à beira da estrada, Catelyn, que é filha de Lorde Hoster Tully, inesperadamente encontra Tyrion Lannister. Ela reúne os aliados de seu pai em Correrrio para prender Tyrion por conspirar para assassinar seu filho.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Eddard investiga o assassinato de Jon Arryn. Jon faz amizade com Samwell Tarly, um covarde que veio para se juntar à Patrulha da Noite.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E4 - Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: While returning to King's Landing, Tyrion stops at Winterfell where he presents the Starks a saddle design that will allow the paraplegic Bran to ride a horse. Ned secretly investigates Jon Arryn's death. In the process, he discovers one of King Robert's illegitimate children, Gendry, an armorer. Robert and his guests attend a tournament honoring Ned, which Ned considers an extravagance. Jon takes measures to protect Samwell Tarly, an awkward and friendless Night's Watch recruit, from the other Watchmen's abuse. A frustrated Viserys clashes with his newly-empowered sister. Sansa dreams of one day becoming queen, while Arya envisions a far different future. At a roadside tavern, Catelyn, who is Lord Hoster Tully's daughter, unexpectedly encounters Tyrion Lannister. She rallies her father's Riverrun allies to arrest Tyrion for conspiring to murder her son.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Eddard investigates Jon Arryn's murder. Jon befriends Samwell Tarly, a coward who has come to join the Night's Watch.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E4 - Cripples, Bastards, and Broken Things

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types
Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Margaery, newly wed to King Tommen Baratheon, manipulates him to consider sending Cersei to Casterly Rock to eliminate her interference. Littlefinger takes Sansa to Winterfell to cement an alliance with Roose Bolton through marriage to his son, Ramsay and Sansa without the Lannisters knowledge. Sansa's unconsummated marriage with Tyrion is considered void. Brienne trains Podrick in swordsmanship. To conform to the House of Black and White, Arya tosses her personal effects into the harbor, but hides Needle in a pile of rocks. At Castle Black, Jon names Thorne First Ranger. When Slynt disobeys Jon's orders, Jon executes him. Lancel discovers the High Septon in a brothel, and he is forced to walk the streets nude as punishment. The High Septon protests to Cersei, who imprisons him. She meets with the High Sparrow, approving the Sparrows' actions. Tyrion and Varys arrive in Volantis. Soon after, Tyrion is abducted by Jorah, intending to give him, "to the queen".
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tommen and Margaery wed. Arya has trouble adapting to her new life. Littlefinger reveals his plans to Sansa. Jon gives his first orders as Lord Commander. Tyrion and Varys arrive in Volantis.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: O encontro de Jon com Mance Rayder termina abruptamente quando Stannis e seu exército invadem o acampamento dos Selvagens, fazendo Mance prisioneiro. Bran encontra o represeiro de suas visões, mas criaturas esqueléticas atacam o grupo, matando Jojen. Um Filho da Floresta salva os outros e os leva para o Corvo de Três Olhos, revelado ser um velho envolto em raízes de árvores dentro de uma caverna segura. No Vale, Brienne e Podrick encontram Arya e o Cão, que ataca Brienne; ela o fere criticamente, enquanto Arya foge e foge de Brienne. O Cão implora a Arya para matá-lo, mas ela pega seu dinheiro e o deixa para morrer. Ela embarca em um navio com destino a Bravos para encontrar H'ghar. Em Porto Real, Cersei ordena que Qyburn salve Sor Gregor, que foi envenenado pela lâmina de Oberyn. Jaime liberta Tyrion da prisão, mas antes de escapar da cidade, Tyrion encontra Shae na cama de Tywin e a estrangula fatalmente. Ele confronta e mata Tywin no banheiro, então é contrabandeado a bordo de um navio por Varys. Em Meereen, alguns ex-escravos sentem falta de seus vínculos, achando a liberdade uma dificuldade. Um cidadão traz a Daenerys os restos carbonizados de sua filha, queimados pelo fogo do dragão. Daenerys acorrenta Rhaegal e Viserion nas catacumbas, enquanto Drogon permanece foragido.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon toma uma decisão importante. Daenerys experimenta novas consequências. Brienne e Podrick têm um encontro inesperado. Bran atinge um objetivo, enquanto Tyrion faz uma importante descoberta.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Jon's meeting with Mance Rayder abruptly ends when Stannis and his army overrun the Wildling camp, taking Mance prisoner. Bran finds the weirwood tree from his visions but skeletal creatures attack the group, killing Jojen. A Child of the Forest saves the others and takes them to the Three-Eyed Raven, revealed to be an old man encased within tree roots inside a secure cave. In the Vale, Brienne and Podrick encounter Arya and the Hound, who attacks Brienne; she critically wounds him, while Arya runs off and evades Brienne. The Hound begs Arya to kill him, but she takes his money and leaves him for dead. She boards a ship headed to Braavos to find H'ghar. In King's Landing, Cersei orders Qyburn to save Ser Gregor, who was poisoned by Oberyn's blade. Jaime releases Tyrion from prison, but before escaping the city, Tyrion finds Shae in Tywin's bed and fatally strangles her. He confronts and kills Tywin in the privy, then is smuggled aboard a ship by Varys. In Meereen, some ex-slaves miss their bonds, finding freedom a hardship. A citizen brings Daenerys his daughter's charred remains, burned by dragon fire. Daenerys chains Rhaegal and Viserion in the catacombs, while Drogon remains at large.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon makes an important decision. Daenerys experiences new consequences. Brienne and Podrick have an unexpected encounter. Bran achieves a goal, while Tyrion makes an important discovery.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Theon e seus homens perseguem Brandon e Rickon. Tywin tem Harrenhal procurado pelo assassino de seu oficial. Jon recaptura Ygritte, mas ela escapa novamente, levando-o a uma armadilha. Ainda abalada pelo tumulto, Sansa fica horrorizada por ter começado a menstruar e agora ter idade suficiente para se casar e ter filhos de Joffrey. Cersei a avisa para não amar ninguém além de seus filhos, nem mesmo Joffrey. No acampamento de Robb, a fuga fracassada de Jaime deixa um guarda morto e alguns soldados em busca de vingança. Em Qarth, o feiticeiro Pree diz que roubou os dragões de Daenerys; ele oferece a ela a oportunidade de se reunir com eles, então massacra o Conselho dos Treze e estabelece Daxos como rei. Em Winterfell, Theon apresenta os cadáveres carbonizados de dois meninos de fazenda ao Meistre Luwin, alegando que são Brandon e Rickon.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Bran e Rickon escaparam de Winterfell. Theon tenta caçá-los. Os dragões de Daenerys foram roubados. Jon viaja pelo deserto com Ygritte como sua prisioneira. Sansa sangrou e agora está pronta para ter filhos de Joffrey.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E7 - A Man Without Honor

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Theon and his men pursue Brandon and Rickon. Tywin has Harrenhal searched for his officer's killer. Jon recaptures Ygritte, but she escapes again, leading him into a trap. Still shaken from the riot, Sansa is horrified that she has begun menstruating and is now old enough to marry and bear Joffrey's children. Cersei warns her to love no one but her children, not even Joffrey. In Robb's camp, Jaime's failed escape leaves a guard dead and some soldiers seeking retribution. In Qarth, the warlock Pree says he stole Daenerys' dragons; he offers her the opportunity to reunite with them, then slaughters the Council of Thirteen and establishes Daxos as king. In Winterfell, Theon presents the charred corpses of two farm boys to Maester Luwin, claiming they are Brandon and Rickon.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Bran and Rickon have escaped Winterfell. Theon tries to hunt them down. Daenerys' dragons have been stolen. Jon travels through the wilderness with Ygritte as his prisoner. Sansa has bled and is now ready to have Joffrey's children.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S02E7 - A Man Without Honor

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Cersei nomeia Sor Gregor Clegane como seu campeão no próximo julgamento por combate de Tyrion. Jaime e Bronn se recusam a lutar contra Sor Gregor por Tyrion, mas Oberyn aceita. Ele procura vingar sua irmã, o estupro e assassinato de Elia por Sor Gregor durante a rebelião. Daenerys toma Daario como seu amante e o envia para lidar com os traficantes de escravos ressurgentes em Yunkai. Melisandre e Selyse se preparam para partir de Pedra do Dragão, com a intenção de levar Shireen com elas. À medida que os Selvagens se aproximam de Castelo Negro, Alliser Thorne rejeita a sugestão de Jon de selar o túnel. Em uma pousada, Brienne e Podrick conhecem Torta Quente, que os atualiza sobre Arya. Eles resolvem viajar para o Vale, deduzindo que ela procuraria seus parentes vivos lá. No Vale, Lysa testemunha Mindinho beijando Sansa. Enfurecida, ela mais tarde ameaça jogar Sansa pela Moon Door, uma abertura circular no chão de pedra com uma queda íngreme nas rochas abaixo; Mindinho intervém e empurra Lysa para a morte.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion tenta encontrar um campeão. Daenerys dorme com Daario. O Cão fica ferido. O conselho de Jon é ignorado em Castelo Negro. Brienne e Podrick recebem uma dica sobre o paradeiro de Arya.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Cersei appoints Ser Gregor Clegane as her champion in Tyrion's upcoming trial by combat. Jaime and Bronn decline to fight Ser Gregor for Tyrion, but Oberyn accepts. He seeks to avenge his sister, Elia's rape and murder by Ser Gregor during the rebellion. Daenerys takes Daario as her lover, then sends him to handle the resurgent slavers at Yunkai. Melisandre and Selyse prepare to depart Dragonstone, intending to take Shireen with them. As the Wildlings approach Castle Black, Alliser Thorne rejects Jon's suggestion to seal the tunnel. At an inn, Brienne and Podrick meet Hot Pie, who updates them about Arya. They resolve to travel to the Vale, deducing she would seek her living relatives there. In the Vale, Lysa witnesses Littlefinger kissing Sansa. Enraged, she later threatens to throw Sansa through the Moon Door, a circular opening in the stone floor with a steep drop to rocks below; Littlefinger intervenes and shoves Lysa to her death.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion tries to find a champion. Daenerys sleeps with Daario. The Hound becomes wounded. Jon's advice is ignored at Castle Black. Brienne and Podrick receive a tip on Arya's whereabouts.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: A frota de Stannis ataca Porto Real. Sansa joga o jogo, tentando manipular Joffrey para liderar o ataque pessoalmente (na esperança de matá-lo), mas Joffrey fica com muito medo de lutar pessoalmente. Liderando a defesa, Tyrion destrói muitos navios atacantes com fogo, forçando Stannis a atacar em terra. Sandor Clegane lidera a defesa do lado de fora do portão, mas é derrotado e recua para dentro, denunciando Joffrey e saindo. Joffrey recua com medo enquanto Tyrion reúne os Mantos Dourados para lutar com ele. As forças de Stannis entram no castelo, mas Tyrion lidera seus homens atrás das forças de Stannis através de túneis e monta um ataque de retaguarda. Cersei vai para a sala do trono com Tommen, com a intenção de matá-lo para salvá-lo de ser capturado. Shae convence Sansa a se esconder em seu quarto. Sandor Clegane se oferece para levar Sansa para Winterfell, mas ela se recusa a sair. Enquanto Tyrion está ferido e Cersei está prestes a envenenar Tommen, as forças de Tywin, unidas por Loras, chegam e forçam Stannis a recuar.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: A frota e o exército de Stannis Baratheon chegam a Porto Real e a batalha pela cidade começa. Cersei planeja para ela e para o futuro de seus filhos.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Stannis' fleet assaults King's Landing. Sansa plays the game, trying to manipulate Joffrey into leading the attack personally, (in hopes of getting him killed), but Joffrey turns out to be too afraid to fight personally. Leading the defense, Tyrion destroys many attacking ships with wildfire, forcing Stannis to attack on land. Sandor Clegane leads the defense outside the gate, but is defeated and retreats inside, denouncing Joffrey and leaving. Joffrey retreats in fear as Tyrion rallies the Gold Cloaks into fighting with him. Stannis' forces enter the castle, but Tyrion leads his men behind Stannis' forces via tunnels and mounts a rearguard attack. Cersei goes to the throne room with Tommen, intending to kill him to save him from being captured. Shae convinces Sansa to hide in her chamber. Sandor Clegane offers to take Sansa to Winterfell, but she refuses to leave. As Tyrion lies wounded and Cersei is about to poison Tommen, Tywin's forces, joined by Loras, arrive and force Stannis to retreat.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Stannis Baratheon's fleet and army arrive at King's Landing and the battle for the city begins. Cersei plans for her and her children's future.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: O "resgatador" de Theon o trai, devolvendo-o à prisão para mais tortura. Após uma tentativa de fuga fracassada, Jaime acredita estar perdido sem a mão da espada; Brienne pede que ele permaneça esperançoso. Varys conta a Tyrion como ele se tornou um eunuco, então mostra a ele o mago que o castrou, que agora é seu prisioneiro. Ele aconselha Tyrion a ser paciente por vingança. Em Craster's Keep, os Night's Watchmen sobreviventes, famintos, entram em conflito com seu hospedeiro. Craster e Mormont são mortos na luta, e Sam foge com Gilly e seu filho recém-nascido. Arya e Gendry são levados para a caverna secreta da Irmandade, encontrando seu líder, Dondarrion, que mais tarde sentencia Sandor Clegane a julgamento por combate com ele. Margaery propõe que Sansa se case com Loras, o que Sansa acha agradável, sem saber que ele é gay. Daenerys se encontra com o escravista Kraznys para trocar um dragão pelo exército Imaculado. Uma vez que o acordo é fechado, ela ordena que os Imaculados matem todos os mestres de escravos, e faz com que seu dragão queime Kraznys; ela liberta os Imaculados, que voluntariamente a seguem.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jaime lamenta a mão perdida. Cersei está ficando desconfortável com os Tyrells. A Patrulha da Noite está ficando impaciente com Craster. Daenerys compra os Imaculados.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S03E4 - And Now His Watch Is Ended

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Theon's "rescuer" betrays him, returning him to the prison for more torture. After a failed escape attempt, Jaime believes himself lost without his sword hand; Brienne urges him to remain hopeful. Varys tells Tyrion how he became a eunuch, then shows him the magician who castrated him, who is now his captive. He advises Tyrion be patient for vengeance. At Craster's Keep, the surviving Night's Watchmen, starving, come into conflict with their host. Craster and Mormont are slain in the struggle, and Sam flees with Gilly and her new-born son. Arya and Gendry are taken to the Brotherhood's secret cave, meeting their leader, Dondarrion, who later sentences Sandor Clegane to trial by combat with him. Margaery proposes that Sansa marry Loras, which Sansa finds agreeable, unaware he is gay. Daenerys meets with slaver Kraznys to trade one dragon for the Unsullied army. Once the deal is struck, she commands the Unsullied to kill all the slave masters, and has her dragon burn Kraznys; she frees the Unsullied, who willingly follow her.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jaime mopes over his lost hand. Cersei is growing uncomfortable with the Tyrells. The Night's Watch is growing impatient with Craster. Daenerys buys the Unsullied.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S03E4 - And Now His Watch Is Ended
objects.__Episode__title_short: And Now His Watch Is Ended

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Tywin prepara seu jovem neto Tommen para ser o novo rei e alista Oberyn e Mace Tyrell como seus colegas juízes para o julgamento de assassinato iminente de Tyrion. Tyrion escolhe Jaime como sua testemunha. Mindinho, que contratou Sor Dontos para recuperar Sansa, manda matá-lo e então a leva para fora de Porto Real a bordo de seu navio. Nas Terras Fluviais, Arya e o Cão recebem hospitalidade de um camponês e sua filha, a quem o Cão logo rouba, irritando Arya. Para reabastecer as forças esgotadas de Stannis, Davos quer solicitar um empréstimo do Banco de Ferro de Bravos para contratar mercenários chamados de "Companhia Dourada". Em Castle Black, Sam teme pela segurança de Gilly e move ela e Little Sam para a cidade vizinha de Mole. Enquanto isso, os Selvagens continuam a atacar as aldeias do norte. A Patrulha da Noite descobre que os amotinados estão acampados na Fortaleza de Craster. Jon propõe um ataque contra eles para evitar que eles vazem as fraquezas de defesa de Castelo Negro para o exército que se aproxima de Mance Rayder. Daenerys chega a Meereen e faz um discurso empolgante diante dos portões, oferecendo liberdade aos escravos da cidade.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion é preso pelo assassinato de Joffrey e aguarda julgamento. Sansa escapa de Porto Real. Sam envia Gilly para a Cidade da Toupeira enquanto a Patrulha da Noite se encontra em uma situação difícil. Meereen desafia Daenerys.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Tywin grooms his young grandson Tommen to be the new king and enlists Oberyn and Mace Tyrell as his fellow judges for Tyrion's impending murder trial. Tyrion chooses Jaime as his witness. Littlefinger, who hired Ser Dontos to retrieve Sansa, has him killed, then smuggles her out of King's Landing aboard his ship. In the Riverlands, Arya and the Hound are offered hospitality by a peasant farmer and his daughter, whom the Hound soon robs, angering Arya. To replenish Stannis' depleted forces, Davos wants to request a loan from the Iron Bank of Braavos to hire mercenaries called the "Golden Company". At Castle Black, Sam fears for Gilly's safety and moves her and Little Sam to nearby Mole's Town. Meanwhile, the Wildlings continue to raid northern villages. The Night's Watch learns that the mutineers are camped at Craster's Keep. Jon proposes an attack on them to prevent them leaking Castle Black's defense weaknesses to Mance Rayder's approaching army. Daenerys arrives at Meereen and gives a rousing speech before the gates, offering the city's slaves their freedom.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion is arrested for the murder of Joffrey and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town as the Night's Watch finds itself in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Robb e Catelyn vão ao funeral de Hoster Tully em Correrrio. Tywin Lannister envia Mindinho ao Ninho para se casar com Lysa Arryn para garantir sua aliança, e faz de Tyrion o novo Mestre da Moeda. Torta Quente é empregada pela pousada, enquanto Arya e Gendry seguem a Irmandade. Ao saber do massacre no Punho dos Primeiros Homens, Rayder envia Jon e um bando de Selvagens para escalar a Muralha e atacar a Patrulha enquanto ela está enfraquecida. Os homens sobreviventes da Patrulha da Noite retornam à Fortaleza de Craster, onde Gilly dá à luz um filho. Theon é libertado por um homem desconhecido, que mais tarde o resgata novamente. Melisandre deixa Pedra do Dragão, afirmando misteriosamente que o sangue de um rei é necessário para a vitória. Daenerys troca os 8.000 Imaculados e o tradutor Missandei em troca de um de seus jovens dragões, ignorando os conselhos de Selmy e Jorah. Jaime convence seu captor, Locke, a impedir que Brienne seja estuprada alegando que seu pai pagará um grande resgate; Locke concorda, mas corta a mão direita de Jaime sem avisar.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Robb e Catelyn chegam a Correrrio para o funeral de Lorde Hoster Tully. Tywin nomeia Tyrion o novo Mestre da Moeda. Arya se despede de Torta Quente. A Patrulha da Noite retorna ao Craster. Brienne e Jaime são feitos prisioneiros.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Robb and Catelyn attend Hoster Tully's funeral in Riverrun. Tywin Lannister sends Littlefinger to the Eyrie to marry Lysa Arryn to secure her alliance, and makes Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Hot Pie is employed by the inn, while Arya and Gendry follow the Brotherhood. Learning of the massacre at the Fist of the First Men, Rayder sends Jon and a band of Wildlings to scale the Wall and attack the Watch while it is weakened. The surviving Night's Watch men return to Craster's Keep, where Gilly gives birth to a son. Theon is freed by an unknown man, who later rescues him again. Melisandre leaves Dragonstone, mysteriously stating that the blood of a king is required for victory. Daenerys barters for the 8,000 Unsullied and the translator Missandei in exchange for one of her young dragons, ignoring Selmy's and Jorah's advice. Jaime persuades his captor, Locke, to prevent Brienne being raped by claiming her father will pay a huge ransom; Locke agrees but he then severs Jaime's right hand without warning.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brienne and Jaime are taken prisoner.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Ao norte dos Sete Reinos de Westeros, os soldados da Patrulha da Noite são atacados por Caminhantes Brancos sobrenaturais. Um soldado escapa, mas é capturado no Castelo Winterfell. Eddard "Ned" Stark, Guardião do Norte, o executa por deserção. Mais tarde, seis filhotes de lobos órfãos são encontrados e um dado a cada irmão Stark, incluindo o filho bastardo de Ned, Jon Snow. Em Porto Real, a capital dos Sete Reinos, Jon Arryn, a Mão do Rei, morre repentinamente. Rei Robert Baratheon, velho amigo de Ned, viaja para Winterfell para recrutar Ned e propor um casamento entre seu herdeiro Joffrey e a filha de Ned, Sansa. Lysa Arryn, a viúva de Jon, envia a sua irmã (esposa de Ned), Catelyn, uma carta alegando que os Lannisters, a família da rainha Cersei, assassinaram Arryn. Catelyn acredita que os Lannisters estão tramando contra o Rei Robert. O filho mais novo de Ned, Brandon, sobe em uma torre alta e testemunha Cersei e seu irmão gêmeo, Jaime Lannister, fazendo sexo. Para esconder seu incesto, Jaime empurra Bran da janela alta. Do outro lado do Mar Estreito em Essos, o príncipe exilado Viserys Targaryen força sua irmã, Daenerys, a se casar com o senhor da guerra Dothraki, Drogo, em troca de um exército para conquistar Westeros e recuperar o Trono de Ferro. Robert Baratheon tornou-se rei depois que Jaime Lannister matou o rei "louco" Aerys Targaryen, ganhando a Jaime o apelido de "O Matador de Reis". Os antigos Targaryens já comandaram dragões, e Daenerys recebe três ovos de dragão fossilizados como presente de casamento.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Estreia da Série. Eddard Stark está dividido entre sua família e um velho amigo quando solicitado a servir ao lado do rei Robert Baratheon; Viserys planeja casar sua irmã com um senhor da guerra nômade em troca de um exército.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: North of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, Night's Watch soldiers are attacked by supernatural White Walkers. One soldier escapes but is captured at Castle Winterfell. Eddard "Ned" Stark, Warden of the North, executes him for desertion. Later, six orphaned dire wolf pups are found and one given to each Stark sibling, including Ned's bastard son, Jon Snow. In King's Landing, the Seven Kingdoms capital, Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King, dies suddenly. King Robert Baratheon, Ned's old friend, travels to Winterfell to recruit Ned and propose a marriage between his heir Joffrey and Ned's daughter, Sansa. Lysa Arryn, Jon's widow, sends her sister (Ned's wife), Catelyn, a letter claiming the Lannisters, Queen Cersei's family, murdered Arryn. Catelyn believes the Lannisters are now plotting against King Robert. Ned's young son, Brandon, climbs a tall tower and witnesses Cersei and her twin brother, Jaime Lannister, inside having sex. To hide their incest, Jaime pushes Bran from the high window. Across the Narrow Sea in Essos, exiled Prince Viserys Targaryen forces his sister, Daenerys, to marry the Dothraki warlord, Drogo, in exchange for an army to conquer Westeros and reclaim the Iron Throne. Robert Baratheon became king after Jaime Lannister killed "Mad" King Aerys Targaryen, earning Jaime the nickname, "The King Slayer". The ancient Targaryens once commanded dragons, and Daenerys is given three fossilized dragon eggs as a wedding gift.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Series Premiere. Eddard Stark is torn between his family and an old friend when asked to serve at the side of King Robert Baratheon; Viserys plans to wed his sister to a nomadic warlord in exchange for an army.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: No Norte, Jojen diz a Bran que eles não devem parar no Castelo Negro, mas viajar além da Muralha para encontrar o Corvo de Três Olhos; Osha os avisa sobre os mortos-vivos. O relacionamento de Jon e Ygritte se aprofunda, irritando o ciumento Wildling, Orell. O torturador de Theon o castra. Robb descobre que Talisa está grávida. Arya escapa da Irmandade, apenas para ser capturada por Sandor. Melisandre diz a Gendry que seu pai era o rei Robert. Shae avisa Tyrion que seu relacionamento terminará quando ele se casar com Sansa. Tywin e Joffrey discutem sobre Daenerys; Tywin a descarta como uma ameaça em potencial. Daenerys chega a Yunkai e declara guerra à cidade. Roose Bolton deixa Harrenhal para o casamento de Edmure Tully enquanto Jaime se despede de Brienne ao partir para Porto Real. Na estrada, Jaime descobre que Locke recusou o resgate do pai de Brienne. Jaime retorna a Harrenhal para encontrar Brienne em um poço lutando contra um urso. Ele salva Brienne, e eles partem juntos.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon e os selvagens viajam ao sul da Muralha. Talisa diz a Robb que está grávida. Arya foge da Irmandade. Daenerys chega a Yunkai. Jaime deixa Brienne para trás em Harrenhal.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S03E7 - The Bear and the Maiden Fair
objects.__Episode__title_short: O Urso e a Bela Donzela

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: In the North, Jojen tells Bran they must not stop at Castle Black, but travel beyond the Wall to find the Three-eyed Raven; Osha warns them about the walking dead. Jon and Ygritte's relationship deepens, angering jealous Wildling, Orell. Theon's torturer castrates him. Robb learns Talisa is pregnant. Arya escapes the Brotherhood, only to be captured by Sandor. Melisandre tells Gendry that his father was King Robert. Shae warns Tyrion that their relationship will end once he marries Sansa. Tywin and Joffrey discuss Daenerys; Tywin dismisses her as a potential threat. Daenerys reaches Yunkai and declares war on the city. Roose Bolton leaves Harrenhal for Edmure Tully's wedding while Jaime bids Brienne farewell as he departs for King's Landing. On the road, Jaime learns Locke has refused Brienne's father's ransom. Jaime returns to Harrenhal to find Brienne in a pit fighting a bear. He saves Brienne, and they depart together.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon and the wildlings travel south of the Wall. Talisa tells Robb that she's pregnant. Arya runs away from the Brotherhood. Daenerys arrives at Yunkai. Jaime leaves Brienne behind at Harrenhal.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S03E7 - The Bear and the Maiden Fair
objects.__Episode__title_short: The Bear and the Maiden Fair

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types
Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Selyse, now distraught over Shireen's death, hangs herself, while half of Stannis' forces desert and Melisandre flees to Castle Black. The Boltons easily defeat Stannis' depleted army. Brienne finds Stannis on the battlefield and executes him for Renly Baratheon's murder. Theon kills Myranda after she catches him and Sansa attempting to escape Winterfell. The duo leap from the outer wall together. Cersei confesses her former relationship with Lancel and must atone by parading the streets naked, pelted with garbage, spit, and feces by jeering crowds. Upon reaching the Red Keep, Qyburn introduces her to the newest Kingsguard member who is completely loyal. Jaime, Myrcella, Bronn, and Trystane set sail from Dorne, but Myrcella has been poisoned by Ellaria Sand and soon dies. Arya is punished, losing her sight, for violating the Faceless Men rules after killing Trant for personal revenge. Varys arrives in Meereen to govern the city with Tyrion, Grey Worm, and Missandei, while Daario and Jorah search for Daenerys, who has been captured by a Dothraki horde. Samwell, Gilly, and Little Sam leave Castle Black for Oldtown where Samwell will train as a Maester. Mutineers, including Alliser Thorne and Jon's steward, Olly, fatally stab Jon, leaving his body in the courtyard.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Stannis arrives at Winterfell. Tyrion runs Meereen as Daario and Jorah go after Daenerys. Jaime and Myrcella leave Dorne. Jon sends Sam and Gilly to Oldtown. Arya challenges the Many-Faced God. Cersei confesses her sins.

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Cersei's uncle, Kevan Lannister, is appointed as the Hand of the King. Cersei refuses to confess her crimes. H'ghar tasks Arya to study a marine insurance vendor who defrauds beneficiaries. Disguised as a shellfish peddler, she is to first learn about the insurer and then poison him. Theon tells Sansa that he faked killing Brandon and Rickon. Ramsay asks Roose for twenty men to attack Stannis's camp. In Meereen, Tyrion convinces Daenerys to spare Jorah's life; she does but exiles him again. Jorah returns to Yezzan and asks to fight in the pits. Daenerys accepts Tyrion into her council. Arriving in Hardhome, Jon and Tormund recruit five thousand Wildlings but an army of wights attacks them. Jon kills a White Walker with Longclaw, his Valyrian steel sword. As he, Tormund, and the other survivors escape by sea, they witness the Night King reanimating the dead Wildlings.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Tyrion advises Daenerys. Sansa forces Theon to tell her a secret. Cersei remains stubborn. Arya meets her first target. Jon and Tormund meet with the wildling elders.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: O exército Stark chega ao castelo dos Gêmeos; Catelyn convence Lorde Walder Frey a permitir que eles passem por suas terras e os ajudem em troca de Robb e Arya se casarem com dois dos muitos descendentes pouco atraentes de Frey no futuro. Na Muralha, Jeor Mormont dá sua espada de aço valiriano para Jon em gratidão; Meistre Aemon revela a Jon que Aemon é um Targaryen. Em Essos, a ferida de Drogo torna-se séptica e sua morte iminente. Daenerys pede a uma escrava mística que use magia de sangue para salvá-lo. A mulher diz a todos para permanecerem fora da tenda até que o feitiço seja lançado. Daenerys entra em trabalho de parto e Jorah a traz para a tenda em busca de ajuda. Robb sacrifica 2.000 soldados para lutar contra o exército Lannister como uma distração para que ele possa mover seu exército e capturar Jaime. Em uma audiência pública, Ned confessa traição e afirma publicamente que Joffrey é o herdeiro legítimo. No entanto, em vez de poupar sua vida conforme negociado, o vingativo e cada vez mais insano Joffrey o decapita, enquanto Sansa, Cersei e outros conselheiros se opõem inutilmente. Sansa é forçada a ver seu pai morrer enquanto Arya está por perto no meio da multidão.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Robb vai para a guerra contra os Lannisters. Jon se vê lutando para decidir se seu lugar é com Robb ou com a Patrulha da Noite. Drogo adoeceu devido a um novo ferimento de batalha. Daenerys está desesperada para salvá-lo.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: The Stark army arrives at the Twins castle; Catelyn persuades Lord Walder Frey to allow them to pass through his land and assist them in exchange for Robb and Arya marrying two of Frey's many unattractive offspring in the future. At the Wall, Jeor Mormont gives his family Valyrian steel sword to Jon in gratitude; Maester Aemon reveals to Jon that Aemon is a Targaryen. In Essos, Drogo's wound becomes septic and his death imminent. Daenerys asks a mystic slave woman to use blood magic to save him. The woman tells everyone to remain outside the tent until after the spell is cast. Daenerys goes into labor, and Jorah brings her into the tent seeking aid. Robb sacrifices 2,000 soldiers to fight the Lannister army as a diversion so he can move his army and capture Jaime. In a public hearing, Ned confesses to treason and publicly affirms Joffrey is the rightful heir. However, rather than sparing his life as negotiated, the vengeful and increasingly insane Joffrey has him decapitated, while Sansa, Cersei, and other counselors object futilely. Sansa is forced to watch her father die while Arya is nearby in the crowd.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Robb goes to war against the Lannisters. Jon finds himself struggling on deciding if his place is with Robb or the Night's Watch. Drogo has fallen ill from a fresh battle wound. Daenerys is desperate to save him.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Após o ataque dos Caminhantes Brancos, os Vigilantes da Noite sobreviventes, incluindo Samwell Tarly e Jeor Mormont, prometem retornar à Muralha e avisar os Sete Reinos. Jon é levado a Mance Rayder, o "Rei além da Muralha", e promete sua lealdade aos Selvagens. A cicatrizado Tyrion Lannister tenta negociar Casterly Rock de Tywin, que oferece promessas menores. Margaery Tyrell se envolve em atos de caridade com os órfãos de Porto Real. Mindinho se oferece para ajudar Sansa Stark a escapar de Porto Real. Ros avisa Shae para desconfiar de Mindinho. Davos é resgatado por Saan, que quer romper os laços com Stannis Baratheon. Davos retorna a Pedra do Dragão, onde ele tenta sem sucesso matar Melisandre e é preso. Ela o culpa por convencer Stannis a não deixá-la entrar na batalha. Em Essos, Daenerys Targaryen chega a Astapor para comprar um exército de soldados mercenários brutalmente treinados chamados "Imaculados". Os feiticeiros de Qarth tentam assassiná-la, mas Selmy, um ex-comandante da Guarda Real, a salva e promete sua lealdade.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon é levado a Mance Rayder, o Rei Além da Muralha, enquanto os sobreviventes da Patrulha da Noite recuam para o sul. Em Porto Real, Tyrion pede sua recompensa. Mindinho oferece a Sansa uma saída.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: After the White Walkers' attack, the surviving Night's Watchmen, including Samwell Tarly and Jeor Mormont, pledge to return to the Wall and warn the Seven Kingdoms. Jon is brought before Mance Rayder, the "King beyond the Wall", and pledges his loyalty to the Wildlings. A scarred Tyrion Lannister attempts to negotiate Casterly Rock from Tywin, who offers lesser promises. Margaery Tyrell engages in charitable acts with King's Landing orphans. Littlefinger offers to help Sansa Stark escape King's Landing. Ros warns Shae to distrust Littlefinger. Davos is rescued by Saan, who wants to break ties with Stannis Baratheon. Davos returns to Dragonstone where he unsuccessfully tries to kill Melisandre and is imprisoned. She blames him for convincing Stannis not to let her join the battle. In Essos, Daenerys Targaryen arrives in Astapor to buy an army of brutally-trained mercenary soldiers called the "Unsullied". The Qarth warlocks attempt to assassinate her, but Selmy, a former Kingsguard commander, saves her and pledges his loyalty.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Jon is brought before Mance Rayder, the King Beyond the Wall, while the Night's Watch survivors retreat south. In King's Landing, Tyrion asks for his reward. Littlefinger offers Sansa a way out.

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: Em Porto Real, Ned confronta Cersei, dizendo que sabe que Jaime foi pai de seus filhos e informará o Rei Robert. Antes que ele possa, Robert é gravemente ferido enquanto caçava um javali. Enquanto Robert está morrendo, ele assina uma proclamação nomeando Ned "Protetor do Reino", até que o herdeiro de Robert possa assumir o trono. Ned altera o texto para dizer herdeiro legítimo do rei. Ned manda uma mensagem a Stannis, irmão de Robert, o herdeiro legal do trono. Ned pede a Petyr Baelish para garantir a lealdade da Patrulha da Cidade. Após a morte de Robert, Ned confronta Cersei e Joffrey na sala do trono, onde Baelish e a Patrulha da Cidade traem Ned e atacam seus homens. Na Muralha, Benjen Stark desaparece durante uma incursão ao norte da Muralha. Jon e Sam são designados como mordomos, com Jon como servo pessoal do Lorde Comandante Jeor Mormont. Jon está desapontado por não ter sido escolhido como patrulheiro até Sam apontar que o Comandante Mormont provavelmente pretende prepará-lo para o comando. Os mordomos juram lealdade à Patrulha da Noite. Em Essos, o assassino contratado do Rei Robert é exposto por Sor Jorah antes que ele possa envenenar Daenerys. Drogo promete conquistar os Sete Reinos para seu filho ainda não nascido e começa a marchar em direção a Westeros.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Robert foi ferido enquanto caçava e está morrendo. Jon e os outros finalmente fazem seus votos para a Patrulha da Noite. Um homem, enviado por Robert, é capturado por tentar envenenar Daenerys. Furioso, Drogo promete atacar os Sete Reinos.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E7 - You Win or You Die

objects.title: Always - All devices, all customer types

objects.__Episode__synopsis: In King's Landing, Ned confronts Cersei, saying he knows Jaime fathered her children and will inform King Robert. Before he can, Robert is critically wounded while hunting boar. As Robert lies dying, he signs a proclamation naming Ned "Protector of the Realm," until Robert's heir can assume the throne. Ned amends the wording to say the king's rightful heir. Ned sends word to Stannis, Robert's brother, the legal heir to the throne. Ned asks Petyr Baelish to secure the City Watch's loyalty. After Robert's death, Ned confronts Cersei and Joffrey in the throne room, where Baelish and the City Watch betray Ned and attack his men. At the Wall, Benjen Stark disappears during a foray north of the Wall. Jon and Sam are assigned as stewards, with Jon as Lord Commander Jeor Mormont's personal servant. Jon is disappointed he was not chosen as a ranger until Sam points out that Commander Mormont likely intends to groom him for command. The stewards swear their loyalties to the Night's Watch. In Essos, King Robert's hired assassin is exposed by Ser Jorah before he can poison Daenerys. Drogo vows to conquer the Seven Kingdoms for his unborn son and starts marching towards Westeros.
objects.__Episode__synopsis_short: Robert has been injured while hunting and is dying. Jon and the others finally take their vows to the Night's Watch. A man, sent by Robert, is captured for trying to poison Daenerys. Furious, Drogo vows to attack the Seven Kingdoms.
objects.__Episode__title: GOT S01E7 - You Win or You Die
